channel.title: How to make a simple client
channel.description:
GUYS PLEASE LISTEN.... I MADE A SERVER AND A CLIENT CAME WITH IT.....
BUT WHEN I GIVE THEM MY CLIENT TO DOWNLOAD IT WORKS BUT THEY CANT LOG IN TO MY SERVER....
BUT FOR ME WHEN I USE CLIENT IT WORKS PERFECTLY PLEASE HELP ME....
THANKS GUYS

item.title: How to make a simple client
item.dc:creator: @nikolaww3 nikolaww3
item.description:
@nikolaww3 wrote:

here is what you do
open EGUI.JAVA or if u have GUI.JAVA and then ctrl + f = 0.0.0.0 Or ctrl + f = 127.0.0.1 Change it to ur ip and save compile and done! they can log in now

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a simple client
